description: Security: GCP Audit - Looks for a spike in the rate of an actions when the event outcome is a failure, which may simply indicate an impending service failure but these can also be byproducts of attempted or successful persistence, privilege escalation, defense evasion, discovery, lateral movement, or collection activity by a threat actor.

detectors.detector_description: Detects high distinct count of failing event actions.

custom_settings.security_app_display_name: Spike in GCP Audit Actions on failure
